title: "O"

categories: [stan]
description: "One of many ways to parameterize a sufficient Gamma"
image: header.png
---


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(cmdstanr)
library(riekelib)
```
:::



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Simulate two groups with a mean of 16
set.seed(2026)
gamma_data <-
  tibble(group = c("A", "B"),
         alpha = c(4, 8),
         theta = c(4, 2)) %>%
  mutate(y = pmap(list(alpha, theta), ~rgamma(5000, shape = ..1, scale = ..2)))
```
:::



$$
\Pr(x) = \frac{1}{\Gamma(\alpha)\theta^\alpha}x^{\alpha-1}e^{-x/\theta}
$$

$$
\Pr\left(\prod x, \sum x, n | \alpha, \theta\right) = \frac{1}{\Gamma(\alpha)^n\theta^{n\alpha}}\left(\prod x\right)^{\alpha-1}e^{-\sum x/\theta}
$$
